trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) dips a dart into a vial\,? and then shoots it through a blowgun at you\.$

trigger.match: ^A dart flies in from .+? and strikes you\.$

trigger.match: ^Taking a rope\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) quickly trusses you up\, tightening the bindings until you can barely move\.$

trigger.match: ^Leaping out from the shadows\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) suddenly waylays you\, throwing you to the ground and then standing menacingly over you\.$

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) carefully rushes directly at you and trusses you up in the most clever manner possible\.$
trigger.name: stealth_rush__
